statements: SELECT * FROM medications
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT batch_number, medication_name FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE batch_number LIKE 'BATCH%'
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM medications GROUP BY medication_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' OR medication_name = 'Paracetamol' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM medications GROUP BY medication_name ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medications
SELECT manufacturing_date, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE batch_number = 123
SELECT * FROM recalls
SELECT recall_reason, recall_date FROM recalls WHERE recall_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturing_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT m.medication_name, r.recall_reason FROM medications m JOIN recalls r ON m.batch_number = r.batch_number WHERE r.recall_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recalls WHERE recall_reason LIKE '%quality%' OR recall_reason LIKE '%safety%' ORDER BY recall_date ASC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity AS stock, manufacturing_date AS mfg_date FROM medications ORDER BY mfg_date DESC, stock ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recalls;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM batch_tracking;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM batch_tracking ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT recall_id, reason FROM recalls WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY recall_id DESC;
SELECT batch_number, location, timestamp FROM batch_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM medications JOIN batch_tracking ON medications.batch_number = batch_tracking.batch_number;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, batch_number FROM medications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT recall_code, recall_date FROM recalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT b.medication_id, b.production_date, m.medication_name FROM batches b JOIN medications m ON b.medication_id = m.id;
SELECT bm.recall_id, bm.batch_id, r.recall_reason FROM batch_mappings bm JOIN recalls r ON bm.recall_id = r.id;
SELECT id, medication_name FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT recall_code, recall_reason FROM recalls WHERE recall_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM batches WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT bm.recall_id, b.batch_number, r.recall_reason FROM batch_mappings bm JOIN batches b ON bm.batch_id = b.id JOIN recalls r ON bm.recall_id = r.id;
SELECT m.medication_name, COUNT(b.id) AS total_batches FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id GROUP BY m.medication_name HAVING total_batches > 5 ORDER BY total_batches DESC;
SELECT * FROM BatchNumbers ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM BatchNumbers WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT batch_id, medication_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM BatchNumbers WHERE expiration_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM BatchNumbers WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM BatchNumbers WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM Manufacturers WHERE location LIKE '%City' ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecallHistory INNER JOIN Manufacturers ON RecallHistory.batch_id = Manufacturers.manufacturer_id WHERE reason = 'Expired' ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM Medications WHERE dosage IS NOT NULL ORDER BY medication_name;
